messages.message:
*PSA: Please Delete your Azure Sandboxes (via Jenkins)*
We are quickly running into quota issues on Azure due to the great many sandboxes and other resources that have been getting turned up.  To try to combat this and keep our azure spend down, please delete you sandbox resources when you are done using it.  We are working on other features to help with this (e.g. hibernating), but for now we have implemented a Jenkins deletion pipeline:

Azure Sandbox Deletion Jenkins Pipeline (https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/sandbox-azure-destroyer/).

Also updated the Azure Sandbox Confluence Page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TI/pages/1606483977/Azure+Create+an+IB+Sandbox#Deleting-a-sandbox) with instructions for deleting sandboxes.
